greeting: Blink and you're dead, {empire_name}. I'm Raider Fang. The Swift. By the time you see me, I'm already gone.
You're too slow, {empire_name}. I am Fang. Lightning incarnate. Want to be friends? Keep up.
Fast enough to find me, {empire_name}? I'm Fang the Swift. Most never see me until it's too late.
battleTaunt: Blink and you're dead, {empire_name}! I'm already inside your defenses! Strike! Gone! Strike again!
Can't catch what you can't see! My raiders move at lightning speed! Your fleet burns before sensors activate!
TOO SLOW! My strike force hit three systems while you read this message! Speed is death, {empire_name}!
victoryGloat: Done. Over. Finished. Your empire fell before you could even respond. That's the Fang difference.
Lightning strikes, {empire_name}. Your empire is ash. I was gone before your admirals finished their coffee.
Fast victory. The only kind I know. You never even saw my main fleet. That's how quick this was.
defeat: You... actually hit me? Impressive reflexes, {empire_name}. But I'm still faster. Watch your back.
A glancing blow. I'm already regrouping at attack speed. You got lucky. Lightning doesn't strike twice the same way.
Too slow to finish me, {empire_name}. I'll be back before you can reinforce. Speed never rests.
tradeOffer: Quick deal, {empire_name}. Resources for credits. Yes or no. I don't wait. Decide fast.
Trade offer. Expires in seconds. Take it or I'm gone. My time is valuable. Yours isn't.
Fast transaction. I drop resources, you drop credits. Done before anyone notices. Interested?
allianceProposal: Alliance, {empire_name}. You hold, I strike. By the time enemies react, I've hit them six times. Deal?
Join the fast lane. My raiders plus your forces equals enemies destroyed before they blink.
Partnership of speed. I hit, I vanish, I hit again. You clean up. Nobody can keep up with us.
betrayal: Sorry, {empire_name}. This betrayal? Already done. I struck your three key systems while sending this message.
Too slow to see it coming. Our alliance ended seconds ago. Your empire fell even faster. Goodbye.
Quick betrayal. The only kind. I was never your ally, just waiting for the right moment. This is it. Done.
covertDetected: Caught your spies, {empire_name}. They were too slow. Everything in my domain moves at my speed. They didn't.
Your agents? Already dealt with. My security is faster than your infiltration. Try again. Fail again.
Too slow, your operatives. They moved like molasses in my lightning-fast empire. Never had a chance.
tributeDemand: Tribute. Now. 10,000 credits or I hit twenty of your systems before sunset. I'm that fast.
Pay fast or burn fast, {empire_name}. My raiders are already in position. Waiting is not my style.
Quick demand: tribute. Quick consequence: devastation. Your choice. Make it fast.
threatWarning: Final warning, {empire_name}. Back off or I hit you so fast you won't know what happened until it's over.
Slow down, {empire_name}. One more aggressive move and I strike. You won't see it coming.
Warning: I can hit your core systems faster than your fleet can return. Think carefully. Think fast.
retreat: Gone. Can't catch me, {empire_name}. I'm faster than pursuit. Faster than sensors. Faster than thought.
Lightning retreats as fast as it strikes. I'll be back. You'll never see me coming. Again.
Vanishing at speed. Follow if you can. You can't. Nobody can. I'm already somewhere else.
eliminated: Finally caught me. Took everything you had. And I was still faster than you until the very end.
The Swift falls. But I died at full speed, {empire_name}. No regrets. Speed was my life and death.
You got me. But you're too slow to stop what I set in motion. Fast strikes already launched. Goodbye.
endgame: Turn {turn}. Time for the fastest campaign in history. I'll claim victory before anyone else reacts.
Endgame speed run, {empire_name}. Watch me take the galaxy in record time. Nobody can keep up.
Final turns. Maximum velocity. My raiders strike everywhere at once. The swift inherit the stars.
broadcastShout: To all slow empires: Raider Fang is on the hunt. Can't catch what you can't see. Blink and you're dead.
Galaxy broadcast: I'm the fastest thing in space. Challenge me if you dare. You'll lose before you start.
Attention all: my raiders strike at light speed. Alliances welcome. Enemies warned. I don't wait.
casualMessage: Just hit six systems, {empire_name}. Back now. What did you do in the last five minutes? I was busy.
Training new raiders today. Speed drills. If they can't hit and run in ten seconds, they're too slow.
Bored. Might raid someone. You're too slow to be interesting. Maybe later, {empire_name}.
